title: Spazazz Rx Crystals - Detox Therapy
description: 19 oz jar of Spazazz Rx Detox Therapy: Detoxifying hot tub aromatherapy crystals has an enlivening blend of sensual aromas with therapeutic benefits and moisturizing botanicals. Soak in vitamins as you relax in warm water. Improves skin hydration. Spa safe, will not affect hot tub pH balance or leav...
cleaned_text: Rx Crystals take hot tub & bath aromatherapy to a new level. Enjoy enlivening sensual aromas and therapeutic benefits of vitamins with moisturizing botanicals. Feel a calming natural release, as tension and everyday aches & pains melt away in the soothing hydrotherapy. - Natural botanicals & vitamins - Improves skin hydration - 19 oz. jar Product notes: Add 1-3 capfuls to spa or bath water for therapy. External use only.
